Service Details: - Volunteer outreach service that helpsolder adults rebuild social and community connections to reduce feelings of loneliness and isolation- Volunteers are screened, trained and then matched with older adults who have indicated an interest in the program- Volunteers will meet with participants in their own home and may also join them in attending existing community events and activities
How to Apply: Participants can call to find out more details or may be referred by a friend, relative or medical professional.
